title: Three Colors: Red
quote: Perhaps you're the woman I never met.

title: Manhattan
quote: Talent is luck. The important things in life is courage.

title: Amadeus
quote: Goodness is nothing in the furnace of art.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
quote: Remember, no man is a failure who has friends.

title: It Happened One Night
quote: I want to kiss you just once.. Softly and sweetly on your mouth.
They hate you because they know they can neither corrupt you nor rule you.

title: Sunset Boulevard
quote: We don't need dialog. We had faces
To fall in love with you, that was the idiotic thing.
Funny how gentle people get with ypu once you're dead.

title: The Two Popes
quote: When no one is to blame, everyone is to blame.
Well, perhaps the path appears straight when we look back at it. On the way, we often feel lost.

title: The Wind Rises
quote: Inspiration unlocks the future.
Be careful, this may be a dream but you can still lose your head!

title: Gone with the Wind
quote: You should be kissed, and often, and by someone who knows how.
Death, taxes and childbirth! There’s never any convenient time for any of them.
Life’s under no obligation to give us what we expect. We take what we get and are thankful it’s no worse than it is.
Hardships make or break people.
I’d cut up my heart for you to wear if you wanted it.

title: Cinema Paradiso
quote: Any room for me in this new paradise?
A mob doesn't think. They don't know what they're doing.
Life is not what you see in films. Life is much harder.
